title: coinoswallet
author: coinoswallet
content: Hi everyone ! In Vancouver, TACOS JORGE (Glitch Cafe) now using COINOS to accept BTC, L-BTC & BTC Lightning. Amazing Mexican food! COINOS is a BTC & lightning wallet that also accepts LIQUID & TETHER!   www.coinos.ioRestaurant Location:2287 W Broadway StVancouver, BC, CanadaIt's listed on COINMAP for all the bitcoiners around the world to see —> coinmap.org/venue/477576
